resources.string:
This card lets you remotely restart the device. A reset is required to complete a Firmware Update or Factory Reset. 

Switch to Firmware Loader: This option sends the Reset command with `boot_mode = 1`. If supported, this causes the device to enter the Firmware Loader mode after the reset. 

Advertising name: Supported devices may advertise with a custom Complete Local Name in the Firmware Loader mode. If left empty, the default advertising name will be used. McuMgr Settings Group is required for this feature. 

Force Reset: If the firmware is compiled with Reset Hook that can reject reset commands, enabling this option forces the reset even if itâ€™s initially denied.
